name: invoice-processing-app
description: TDD-built invoice processing application with Visma eAccounting integration

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/api && npm run build --workspace=packages/web && npm run build:copy
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=packages/api && npm run test:unit --workspace=packages/web
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=packages/shared && npm install --workspace=packages/api && npm install --workspace=packages/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=packages/api && npm run lint --workspace=packages/web
